main event: Four unidentified flying objects were spotted over San Antonio, Texas on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were round, disc-shaped, and appeared to be approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter.
The objects had a metallic, silvery appearance and emitted a color similar to white-hot molten metal.
The objects were observed traveling at an estimated speed of 600 to 700 mph at an altitude of 10,000 to 15,000 feet.
The objects made sharp turns and accelerated vertically in a clockwise turn, and disappeared suddenly like an extinguished light.
No sound or propulsion system was noticed, and the objects did not leave any trail or smoke.
sighted object: four round, disc-shaped unidentified flying objects
